targets.query: select sum(rps) as rps from (select non_negative_derivative(min("http.requests-received"), 1s) as rps from "nom-proxy.server.statistics" where $timeFilter group by time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("http.requests-received"), 1s) AS "rps" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

select sum("total-bytes") as "agg-total-bytes" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("http.request-bytes-sent"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("http.request-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("http.response-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("http.response-bytes-sent"), 1s) AS "total-bytes" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("http.request-bytes-sent"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("http.response-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("http.request-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("http.response-bytes-sent"), 1s) AS "total-bytes" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

select sum(rps) as rps from (select non_negative_derivative(min("tls.connections-received"), 1s) as rps from "nom-proxy.server.statistics" where $timeFilter group by time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tls.connections-received"), 1s) AS "rps" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("total-bytes") FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tls.client-bytes-sent"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.client-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.server-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.server-bytes-sent"), 1s) AS "total-bytes" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tls.client-bytes-sent"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.client-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.server-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.server-bytes-sent"), 1s) AS "total-bytes" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

select sum(pps) as proxied from (select non_negative_derivative(min("http.proxied"), 1s) as pps from "nom-proxy.server.statistics" where $timeFilter group by time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

select sum(dps) as "policy-responses-sent" from (select non_negative_derivative(min("http.policy-responses-sent"), 1s) as dps from "nom-proxy.server.statistics" where $timeFilter group by time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

select sum(rps) as "302-responses" from (select non_negative_derivative(min("http.policy-responses-sent-by-status.302"), 1s) as rps from "nom-proxy.server.statistics" where $timeFilter group by time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

select sum(dps) as "403-responses" from (select non_negative_derivative(min("http.policy-responses-sent-by-status.403"), 1s) as dps from "nom-proxy.server.statistics" where $timeFilter group by time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Policy Response Rate by Status Code

targets.query: SELECT SUM(nv) as "no-view" FROM (select non_negative_derivative(min("no-view"), 1s) AS "nv" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM(oad) as "outbound-acl-denied" FROM (select non_negative_derivative(min("outbound-acl-denies"), 1s) AS "oad" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM(drf) as "dns-resolution-failed" FROM (select non_negative_derivative(min("dns-resolution-failed"), 1s) AS "drf" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM(cf) as "connections-failed" FROM (select non_negative_derivative(min("connections-failed"), 1s) AS "cf" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM(brsp) as "bad-response" FROM (select non_negative_derivative(min("http.bad-response"), 1s) AS "brsp" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM(brq) as "bad-request" FROM (select non_negative_derivative(min("http.bad-request"), 1s) AS "brq" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM(erd) as "explicit-request-denied" FROM (select non_negative_derivative(min("http.explicit-requests-denied"), 1s) AS "erd" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("ich") AS "invalid-client-hello" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tls.invalid-client-hello"), 1s) AS "ich" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("td") AS "tunnel-denied" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tls.tunnel-denied"), 1s) AS "td" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("ta") AS "tunnel-allowed" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("tls.tunnel-allowed"), 1s) AS "ta" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("memory-in-use") AS "memory" FROM "nom-proxy.server.usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("user-time"), 1s) AS "cpu" FROM "nom-proxy.server.usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("system-time"), 1s) AS "cpu" FROM "nom-proxy.server.usage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("total-bytes-received") AS "bytes-received" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("http.request-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.client-bytes-received"), 1s) AS "total-bytes-received" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("total-bytes-sent") AS "bytes-sent" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("http.response-bytes-sent"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.client-bytes-sent"), 1s) AS "total-bytes-sent" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("total-bytes-sent") AS "bytes-sent" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("http.request-bytes-sent"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.server-bytes-sent"), 1s) AS "total-bytes-sent" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT SUM("total-bytes-received") AS "bytes-received" FROM (SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("http.response-bytes-received"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(min("tls.server-bytes-received"), 1s) AS "total-bytes-received" FROM "nom-proxy.server.statistics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("num-cpus") AS "num-cpus", "version" FROM "nom-proxy.server.information" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host-name","node-id"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(min("provisioning.update-count"), 1s) AS "update rate" FROM "nom-proxy.layer.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Proxy Provisioning Update Rate by host-name

targets.query: SELECT (min("provisioning.current-time") - min("provisioning.last-update")) AS "update-lag" FROM "nom-proxy.layer.status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host-name" fill(null)

panels.title: Proxy Provisioning Update Time Lag by host-name
